channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: German hotel partially collapses, killing 1 and trapping 8, police say
item.description: At least one person was killed and eight others remained trapped Wednesday after a hotel partially collapsed in the winemaking town of Kroev, Germany.

item.title: Romanian PM to boycott Olympics' closing ceremony after 'scandalous situation' in gymnastics ruling
Belgian Olympian says virus got her sick, not E. coli from Seine River swim
item.description: Claire Michel, a Belgian triathlete who fell ill after a swim in the Seine River,says a virus that made her sick, not E. coli from the waterway.

item.title: CVS Health cuts its 2024 forecast a third time, dragged down by insurance struggles
item.description: CVS Health has chopped its 2024 forecast for a third time as the health care giant continues to struggle with high utilization in its health insurance business

item.title: Insider Buying: CVRx President Bought US$251k Of Shares
Rocket fuel chemical is widespread in food, Consumer Reports finds
item.description: Perchlorate is found in a wide variety of foods, especially products popular with babies and kids, advocacy group says.

item.title: 4 hotel workers charged with felony murder in death of man captured being pinned down
item.description: The Milwaukee District Attorney's Office announced Tuesday it has filed a felony murder charge against four individuals related to D'Vontaye Mitchell's death.

item.title: BMW set to revolutionize EV range with new in-wheel motor: 'An exciting vision for the electric drive of the future'
Part of Germany hotel collapses, killing at least 2 people, trapping others
item.description: Among those saved was a 2-year-old child pulled out unharmed and the child's mother, who was rescued with minor injuries. The child's father is still trapped.

item.title: Progressive Rep. Cori Bush loses high-stakes Democratic primary: AP projection
item.description: After a fiercely competitive primary race, the Associated Press projects that St. Louis County Prosecuting Attorney Wesley Bell has won the Democratic primary in MO.

item.title: Schwab, Fidelity, other online trading brokerages appear to go dark during huge market sell-off
U.K. mint extracts gold from e-waste: "What we're doing here is urban mining"
item.description: "We're taking a waste product that's being produced by society and we're mining the gold from that waste product and starting to see the value in that finite resource," a mint official says.

item.title: Woman charged in Arizona 'fake elector' case pleads guilty, docket shows
item.description: One of former President Donald Trump's so-called "fake electors" has plead guilty to a single "reduced charge" in the Arizona's 2020 election case.

item.title: Archrock's (NYSE:AROC) Earnings Are Weaker Than They Seem
Green River Killer detective advances in race for Washington governor
item.description: Bob Ferguson, a Democrat, will face Republican Dave Reichert, a former sheriff known for his work hunting down the notorious serial killer.

item.title: Body found during search for 5-year-old boy who wandered away from his birthday party
item.description: Matthew Glynn was last seen by family members at his fifth birthday party Monday afternoon, Boise police said.

item.title: Debby tracker: See tropical storm's path as states brace for more rain, flooding
Preliminary 5.2-magnitude earthquake strikes near Bakersfield, rattles LA County
item.description: A preliminary 5.2-magnitude earthquake struck near Bakersfield and shook all the way to Los Angeles County.

item.title: Microsoft hits back at Delta after the airline said last month's tech outage cost it $500 million
item.description: Microsoft is joining cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike in fighting back against criticism from Delta Air Lines

item.title: Utility company's proposal to rat out hidden marijuana operations to police raises privacy concerns
Slotkin, Rogers win Senate primaries in Michigan, CBS News projects
item.description: Democratic Rep. Elissa Slotkin and former Republican Rep. Mike Rogers will face off in November for the seat held by Sen. Debbie Stabenow.

item.title: American Cole Hocker pulls Olympic shocker in men's 1,500, leaving Kerr and Ingebrigtsen behind
item.description: American Cole Hocker pulled the upset of the Olympics on Tuesday night, outracing both favorites Jakob Ingebrigtsen and Josh Kerr to the finish line in the 1,500 meters

item.title: Disney returns to profit in third quarter as streaming business starts making money for first time
U.S. women's soccer team to play Brazil for Olympic gold medal
item.description: The U.S. women's soccer team advanced to the Olympic final with a 1-0 victory over Germany on Tuesday. The team will face Brazil in the gold medal match on Aug. 10. "CBS Saturday Morning" co-host and CBS News and sports correspondent Dana Jacobson has an Olympic recap from Paris.

item.title: 9 dead, including 6 children, after vehicle overturns in canal
item.description: Nine people are dead, including five juveniles, and one person was injured after a vehicle crashed into a canal in Palm Beach County, Florida, authorities said.

item.title: Buffalo man buys lemon from local used car lot, gets help from Erie Times-News
Georgia, South Carolina and Florida work to clear Debby aftermath
item.description: Tropical Storm Debby is moving north after dropping huge amounts of rain on parts of the Southeast. President Biden has authorized emergency declarations from the governors of Florida, Georgia and South Carolina. CBS News correspondent Cristian Benavides has the latest from Savannah, Georgia.

item.title: How Kamala Harris decided on her running mate, Tim Walz
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris spent this past weekend interviewing the top contenders on her VP shortlist.

item.title: Reclusive tribe attacks loggers suspected of encroaching on their land in Peru's Amazon
Harris, Walz kick off tour of battleground states
item.description: After weeks of speculation, Vice President Kamala Harris has selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as her 2024 running mate. The two are now embarking on a tour of seven battleground states this week, starting with the rally in Philadelphia earlier Tuesday. Nidia Cavazos, CBS News campaign reporter, and Robby Mook, manager of Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign, join with more.

item.title: Ex-deputy charged in Sonya Massey killing says he feared for his life, new docs show
item.description: The Sangamon County Sheriff’s Office (SCSO) released new documents in deputy-involved shooting death of Sonya Massey.

item.title: 'I Almost Died of Liver Failure at Age 50—This Is the First Sign I Wish I'd Paid Attention To'
Calls for violence spiked online after Trump rally shooting
item.description: Immediately following July's assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump, there was a significant spike in calls for violence across online platforms. The research firm Moonshot, which tracks domestic violent extremism online, found there were more than 1,500 calls for civil war the day after the shooting — up more than 600% from a normal day. Anna Schecter, senior coordinating producer for CBS News' crime and public safety unit, has the details.

item.title: Elon Musk's X sues advertisers over alleged 'massive advertiser boycott' after Twitter takeover
item.description: A "massive advertiser boycott" allegedly deprived X of billions of dollars.

item.title: The youngest Fortune 500 CFO was set up to run his family’s $21 billion chicken empire. His erratic behavior could change that
Hamas names mastermind of Oct. 7 attacks as political leader
item.description: Amid ongoing cease-fire and hostage negotiations, Hamas has named a key figure behind the Oct. 7 attacks on Israel as its new political leader following the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh in Iran. CBS News foreign correspondent Ramy Inocencio reports from Jerusalem.

item.title: Critics blast new VP nominee Tim Walz for 'massive' COVID-19 fraud 'under his watch'
item.description: As Tim Walz joins Kamala Harris on the Democratic presidential ticket, critics are blasting the governor for how he handled a massive COVID-19 fraud scheme in his state.

item.title: Elon Musk's X sues advertisers over alleged 'massive advertiser boycott' after Twitter takeover
How will Tim Walz impact the Harris campaign?
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris announced Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as her 2024 running mate early Tuesday ahead of their first joint rally in the key state of Pennsylvania. CBS News senior White House and political correspondent Ed O'Keefe, Democratic strategist Joel Payne and CBS News campaign reporter Taurean Small join with more.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Georgia Aquarium CEO passes away; ‘limited operations’ as staff mourns loss
Boeing questioned over mid-air door panel blowout
item.description: Top Boeing officials faced tough questions from the National Transportation Safety Board on Tuesday over a mid-air door panel blowout on one of its planes earlier this year. The incident raised new questions about the company's aircraft safety. CBS News senior transportation correspondent Kris Van Cleave has the latest.

item.title: California rocked by 5.3 magnitude earthquake centered near Bakersfield
item.description: California experienced a spate of earthquakes on Tuesday night.

item.title: After Serena Williams Claimed That She And Her Kids Were Denied Entry To A Restaurant In Paris, A Staff Member Detailed What Apparently Went Down
Simone Biles says she has "no regrets" following Paris Olympics
item.description: Simone Biles is returning home from the Paris Olympic Games with three more gold medals to add to her collection. Jamie Yuccas spoke with the most decorated gymnast in history about her successes and disappointments.

item.title: WATCH: 1st new pandas to arrive in US in over 20 years are about to make their debut
item.description: Pandas Yun Chuan and Xin Bao will be available for public viewing at the San Diego Zoo starting Aug. 8.

item.title: Hamas names Yahya Sinwar, mastermind of the Oct. 7 attacks, as its new leader in show of defiance
Need a pest control company? Here are 5 signs that you do
item.description: From creepy sounds to visible structural damage, these five signs mean it's time to call a professional pest control company.

item.title: WATCH: Tornado wreaks havoc in Buffalo, New York
item.description: The rare weather event in the area tore roofs off buildings, left some without power and flipped over a car.

item.title: Newly released surveillance video shows D’Vontaye Mitchell’s last moments
Best back-to-school deals on smartwatches
item.description: Now's a great time to check out deals on smartwatches for back-to-school from Apple, Google, Samsung and more.

item.title: WATCH: Football player has priceless reaction after sister wins gold at 2024 Olympics
item.description: Thea LaFond’s brother Chreign LaFond couldn’t be prouder after finding out she won Dominica's first-ever gold medal in the triple jump finals in Paris.

item.title: US woman found chained to tree in India tied herself, say police
The best laptops under $1,000 don't skimp on the features
item.description: Here's a roundup of laptops that cost $1,000 or less, but that can easily handle your everyday computing tasks.

item.title: WATCH: Bears tussle in California yard
item.description: Two bears were captured having a playful tussle in the yard of a home in South Lake Tahoe, California.

item.title: US Supreme Court declines to halt Trump's sentencing in hush money case
Samsung's 2024 Frame TV review: A great option for watching NFL football and more
item.description: We got our hands on Samsung's 2024 65" Frame smart TV. And, yep, it's still worth every penny.

item.title: WATCH: Humpback whale spotted swimming without tail
item.description: A humpback whale that was missing its tail and spotted in Washington state's inland waters likely lost its iconic flukes after becoming entangled, experts say.

item.title: Check your lottery tickets. A winning Mega Millions game was sold at a store in SC
The 6 best OLED TVs for 2024 offer unbeatable color and detail
item.description: Discover the best OLED TVs and why they're a great option for watching movies and sports, as well as for gaming.

item.title: WATCH: President Biden welcomes Gershkovich, Whelan, Kurmasheva home
item.description: BREAKING: Freed Americans Evan Gershkovich, Paul Whelan and Alsu Kurmasheva arrive in the U.S. after a historic prisoner swap with Russia.

item.title: Cori Bush becomes second 'Squad' member to lose 2024 primary as Democrats split over Israel
Israel remains on edge ahead of anticipated Iran retaliation
item.description: Iran and its proxies are still expected to retaliate against Israel following the assassinations of senior Hamas and Hezbollah leaders. Imtiaz Tyab has the latest.

item.title: WATCH: Biden sings ‘Happy Birthday’ to daughter of freed prisoner
item.description: The daughter of Alsu Kurmasheva, a Russian-American journalist released in the prisoner exchange, turns 13 on Friday.

item.title: Fossils suggest even smaller ‘hobbits’ roamed an Indonesian island 700,000 years ago
Debby bringing record-breaking rain as it moves slowly up East Coast
item.description: Tropical Storm Debby is dropping record amounts of rain and causing flooding as it moves slowly along the East Coast. The precipitation isn't forecast to let up, as the storm is expected to linger in the Southeast in the coming days. Manuel Bojorquez reports.

item.title: WATCH: How a 4-eared cat is ‘bringing good luck’ to Tennessee animal shelter
item.description: Audio, a cat born with four ears, currently resides at True Rescue, an animal shelter in Mt. Juliet, Tennessee, as he awaits to be adopted.

item.title: Major Earth Systems on Track for Collapse, Scientists Find
Pakistani man charged in alleged murder-for-hire plot against Trump, U.S. officials
item.description: A Pakistani man with alleged ties to Iran is accused by the Justice Department of being part of a murder-for-hire plot against former President Trump and other U.S. officials. Nicole Sganga has the details.

item.title: WATCH: Family of ducks photobomb beautiful sunset shot
item.description: A piece of driftwood provided the perfect frame for a stunning sunset shot at a Michigan beach -- and the moment was made even more special when a family of ducks waddled into frame.

item.title: What is emphysema? David Lynch reveals impact of 'many years of smoking'
A closer look at Tim Walz's background
item.description: With Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz chosen as Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate, Ed O'Keefe takes a closer look at the background of the potential next vice president.

item.title: Pakistani national charged with alleged plot to assassinate Trump, other officials
item.description: A Pakistani national with purported ties to Iran was arrested last month on charges he plotted to assassinate former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Citigroup whistleblower denied share of $400 million penalty
Harris taps Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz for running mate
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris has chosen Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as her running mate. The two appeared at a campaign event in Philadelphia on Tuesday. Nancy Cordes has more on the pick.
